Uses of Interface
io.sphere.sdk.http.HttpClient

  • Packages that use HttpClient 
    Package Description
    io.sphere.sdk.client
    Provides types to connect to the platform via HTTPS.
    io.sphere.sdk.http
    Provides types to deal with HTTP.
